name: Michael Jaser
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: Co-founder of javascript.company (aka Peerigon). I'm teaching Node.js at the university of Applied Sciences Augsburg and we also run NodeSchool Augsburg / Munich and co-organize some other web related meetups.
what_can_i_contribute: Node.js, HTTP(2), microservices, community, teaching js/node, company culture, remote working, WASM, Rust
